description: The Macai Pant combines warmth and weather protection in a trim pant for resort skiing and boarding. Light and strong 2L Gore-Tex fabric gives full waterproof protection. Air permeable Coreloft™ Compact 80 synthetic insulation provides warmth and temperature regulation. WaterTight™ zippers secure the hand pockets, and mesh PowderGuard™ vents provide ventilation without letting in snow.
name: Arcteryx Macai Pants, Reg - Mens
